mapper.insert: insert into tracker_repo ( uuid, repo_id, branch, scan_status ) VALUES ( #{uuid}, #{repoId}, #{branch}, #{status} )
mapper.update: update tracker_repo set scan_status = #{status} where repo_id = #{repoId} and branch = #{branch};
update tracker_repo set latest_commit = #{latestCommit} where repo_id = #{repoId} and branch = #{branch};
mapper.select: select scan_status from tracker_repo where repo_id = #{repoId} and branch = #{branch};
